it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller

Class ControllerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.ControllerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemoteObserver<ViewEvent>, Controller, Runnable, Remote

    public class ControllerImpl
extends Object
implements Controller
    Implementation of the Controller, which uses PersistentViews to decorate the player's views.
    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini

      Constructor and Description
      ControllerImpl(Map<String,RemoteView> remotes)
      Creates the controller for a new instance of the game

      • reconnectRemoteView

        public boolean reconnectRemoteView(String username,
                                   RemoteView remote)
        Tries to reconnect the player with given username, if it has been detected that the player is disconnected
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        username - username of the player
        remote - remote view of the player
        Returns:
